bibl.title: Holy Men and Businessmen: Monks as Intercessors in Fourth-Century Egypt as Illustrated by the Papyri and Ostraca.
bibl.note: Translates some of the relevant documentary texts and offers supplementary commentary to shed light on the role of monks in fourth-century Egypt. Thaumaturge or miracle-worker; Role of prayer and faith as links between documentary and literary sources on monks; Implications on Cistercian studies.
bibl.seg: Tim Vivian, Holy Men and Businessmen: Monks as Intercessors in Fourth-Century Egypt as Illustrated by the Papyri and Ostraca.
